subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Paul Atkinson, who has never ridden in a Triple Crown race, will be aboard Caracortado, the likely favorite in Saturday’s San Felipe Stakes at Santa Anita.
snippet: Paul Atkinson, who has never ridden in a Triple Crown race, will be aboard Caracortado, the likely favorite in Saturday’s San Felipe Stakes at Santa Anita.
